packages.includes: Photography + Videography + Drone with a 5-6 member professional team.
packageDescp: Team includes: 1 traditional photographer, 1 traditional videographer, 1 candid photographer, and 2 cinematographers.
Deliverables include: 1-2 minute teaser, 3-4 minute highlights, 3-4 hour traditional video, 800-1000 images, and 3 Instagram reels.
packages.aboutEquipment: Full-frame cameras (Sony, Canon), lens kit, gimbal, lights, etc.
